item.title: Microsoft Security Exposure Management introduces: Critical asset protection
item.description: In recent years, enterprises attack surface has exploded in volume and diversification. Security teams are struggling to keep pace with the technological advancements and changes occurring daily. New technologies, emerging work trends (such as remote work and distributed teams), expansion of the supply chain, cloud adoption, and more have led to an exponential growth in the size and complexity of the enterprise attack surface.
